## Mock.executesOnce() method

Schedules the mock to use the provided implementation the next time it's called. If anything is already scheduled it will be used first.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
executesOnce(implementation: (...args: ARGS[]) => RETURN): Mock<ARGS, RETURN>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  implementation | (...args: ARGS\[\]) =&gt; RETURN | function to execute. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[Mock](./earljs.mock.md)<!-- -->&lt;ARGS, RETURN&gt;
